input.sentences: we entered the art museum and were excited from the moment we saw the russian marlboro sign .
the abstract art was amazing and beautiful ...
although | i was confused by the weird gold piece .
i took a quick picture in the fashion section..
and snapped a picture of old glory before we walked away .
output.sentences: Hidden away in a tenement on the lower east side of Manhattan I discovered a Russian museum.
There was an assortment of exhibits hung from a cigarette advertisement to a lovely, classy painting.
Confusion began when I ran across a strange golden twisted golden object.
Since the museum was small I stopped for a picture on the way out.
And, for the life of me, I cannot figure out what materials they used to make the American flag at the exit.
